title: admin login with valid credentials
description: Test the /api/auth/login POST endpoint to verify that admin can successfully log in with valid phone number and password, receiving a JWT token and user details in response.

title: fetch dashboard statistics successfully
description: Test the /api/admin/dashboard GET endpoint to ensure it returns accurate and complete dashboard statistics including total users, admins, teams, tournaments, and matches.

title: retrieve all users list
description: Test the /api/admin/users GET endpoint to verify it returns a list of all users with correct details such as id, phone number, team name, team location, and admin status.

title: update user admin status
description: Test the /api/admin/users/{id}/admin PUT endpoint to confirm that admin privileges can be granted or revoked for a user by updating the is_admin field.

title: delete user with safeguards
description: Test the /api/admin/users/{id} DELETE endpoint to ensure users can be deleted except for self-deletion, and proper authorization and validation are enforced.

title: list all teams with details
description: Test the /api/admin/teams GET endpoint to verify it returns a list of all teams with detailed information including team name, location, logo URL, player count, owner info, matches played and won, and trophies.

title: get team details with players
description: Test the /api/admin/teams/{id} GET endpoint to ensure it returns detailed information about a specific team along with its players' details.

title: update team information
description: Test the /api/admin/teams/{id} PUT endpoint to verify that team details such as name, location, and logo URL can be updated successfully with proper validation.

title: delete team with validation
description: Test the /api/admin/teams/{id} DELETE endpoint to confirm that teams can be deleted only if they are not involved in matches, enforcing safeguards and proper authorization.
